name: Between Paint & Jail
description:
Between Paint & Jail

Rob Robbert was an artist but his equals didn't recognize him as one. After some time with no money or job he fell into the darkness, becoming a regular robber with a knack for getting caught, making too much noise and, generally, not being a good thief. That was until the day he came upon the most magic water gun in the world: a water gun that makes the user able to merge into paintings and back. With this newfound ability, Robbert decided to start his revenge, transforming some iconic paintings into new ones resembling himself.

Between Paint & Jail is a stealth game where you get Robbert through some of the world’s most known art galleries in ordcer to destroy and vandalize famous paintings, such as Munch's The Scream or Dali's The persistence of Memory. But beware: the guards will be looking everywhere for you with their flashlights, and the characters won’t let you destroy what’s theirs without a little fight.

Between Paint & Jail is a college project made by Group 9:

- Juan Belío Boquera: @DevBelio
- Eduardo Briones Mera: @edu1231lol
- Augusto Málaga Terreros: @_DrDru
- Guillem Urpí Montserrat: @GuilleStrike

Installation:
1. Download the game file.
2. Extract the files from the .zip in a directory.
3. Open the BP&J folder and execute the .exe file.
4. Enjoy the game!
